entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla #59531
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #59530
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-noop, antiforgery-validation, fortunes_dapper #59529
  • Support F# option type in OpenApi schema generator #59528
    Backlog
  • FromQueryAttribute fails to deserialize complex object if object is the same name as a containing property #59527
  • Possible memory leak in IIS when StartupHook initializes #59524
  • Blazor WASM initial download timeout/retry #59522
  • Blazor net9 PathBase not working #59521
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #59520
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json #59519
  • UseStaticFiles does compression on publish with .net9 #59518

Closed

  • Range Attribute to specify a value inside an array max/min lengths #58993
  • Serialization for Blazor 10 app state store/restore capability #59489
  • [Blazor] JS stopPropagation would prevent the `@onclick` event of blazor #59499
  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorWebInteractiveAuto, blazorWebInteractiveServer, blazorWebInteractiveWebAssembly #59494
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #59508

PullRequests

Created

  • Consume `M.A.App.Internal.Assets` from the SDK during source build #59526
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fixed the area-blazor ownership #59512
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update testing analyzers #59516
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix Prefix Matching Logic in PrefixContainer #58068
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Adds the ability to specify an appsettings file for user-jwts #58605
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • Implement the Mvc PushFileStreamResult API #58161
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [DRAFT] perf: improve ManagedAuthenticatedEncryptor Decrypt() and Encrypt() flow #59424
    area-dataprotection
  • Upgrade to Microsoft.OpenApi 2.x and support OpenAPI v3.1 #59480
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [Reopen] Fix ANCM installer on ARM64 #59483
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Fix Kestrel host header mismatch handling when port in Url #59362
    Servicing-approved, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix Kestrel host header mismatch handling when port in Url #59403
    Servicing-approved, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 8.0.x
  • [release/2.3] Update dependencies to the latest #59509
    area-infrastructure
